column4: Hey everyone. I am currently trying to run some software on my server that does not yet support threading. My server surpasses the minimum requirements; however, when it starts getting heavy use, it slams a CPU and begins to lag.
you could set a higher nice value for it so that other processes will have a higher priority than it.
The process slamming the CPU is lagging, which is causing issues for the people who are all using it at once.
